ABINAYA SUTHANTHIRA RAJAN 
+1  3023638237 | abys011290@gmail.com | Pennsylvania, USA | 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/abinaya-suthanthira-rajan-56b432290 
 
 
PROFILE 
Results-oriented Information Technology professional around 8 years of experience in designing and 
implementing technical solutions that meet diverse client needs. Demonstrates exceptional 
collaboration and strategic planning skills, with a proven ability to adapt quickly to new environments. 
Committed to continuous learning and leveraging emerging technologies to enhance operational 
efficiency. 
 
 
SKILLS  
• Assess customer’s day to day business and technical needs and design software solutions to 
meet those needs.  
• Collaborate with cross functional team to gather requirements and translate the business needs 
to technical specifications with a prime focus on Medicaid and Medicare programs.  
• Good knowledge on project maintained detailed Business Requirements Documents (BRDs),

to technical specifications with a prime focus on Medicaid and Medicare programs.  
• Good knowledge on project maintained detailed Business Requirements Documents (BRDs), 
Software Requirements Specifications (SRSs), and Use Cases/User Stories throughout the SDLC. 
 
• Worked with cross-functional teams as a business system analyst in delivering 
analysis/findings/recommendations for varied client problems. 
•
 
Design and developed SQL queries and stored procedure for data analysis.  
•
 
Assist the Development team to work on dashboard to report the metrics to leadership team.  
•
 
Strong Understanding of the Healthcare Domain - claims processing , payor, benefits , pricing 
and the EDI X12 transactions - 837/999/277Ca/834  
•
 
Expertise on vendor configuration and business to business file routing using sterling file 
gateway and Axway tools.  
•
 
Familiar with HIPAA Regulations and EDI compliance requirements.  
•

TOOLS USED :

•
 
Healthcare applications – FACETS/Health Rules(HRP) 
• Custom Web Dashboard application and PowerShell Scripting (CYGWIN application)

CERTIFICATIONS 
•
 
SQL and relational database 101 by IBM

EXPERIENCE 
 
Business  System Analyst  — November,2021 - Current 
Client -  Geisinger Health Plan   
 
• Implement Solutions to meet the business requirements for the healthcare payor providing  
Medicaid and Medicare solutions.  
 
•
 
Support and coordinate application development for multiple projects. This includes working 
with the Vendors, business, and operational subject matter experts to create functional 
specifications as required. 
 
•
 
Implemented SDLC, agile (SCRUM) methodology for the developing life cycle and followed the

specifications as required. 
 
•
 
Implemented SDLC, agile (SCRUM) methodology for the developing life cycle and followed the 
standards process in the application and elicited requirements from Business users and 
stakeholders. 
 
•
 
Conducted GAP Analysis between new and legacy applications in order to differentiate the 
business rules, Data mapping specifications, and configurations.

• Take up incidents and Service requests related to the Healthcare Payor claims processing both in 
EDI transactions as well FACETS application and provide timely solutions within the organization 
and outside vendors.  
 
• Work with the vendors like Availity/Optum/CMS/Source HOC to configure B2B routes to 
exchange claims and other healthcare data.  
 
• Act as a bridge between the business and development team and maintain process documents 
like TDD/ FRD/BRD and EDI mapping documents.  
 
• Work with the SQL queries and help preparing the dashboard to provide metrics to the upper 
management on the daily incoming and outgoing EDI transactions.  
 
• Work on the backend side of custom web dashboard application and help the team with 
configuring PowerShell scripts for generating Claims/Enrollments/Payment volume reports 
which are sent in a timely manner to the leadership.  
 
• Assisted the Testing team in building test cases by explaining the complex business rules and

which are sent in a timely manner to the leadership.  
 
• Assisted the Testing team in building test cases by explaining the complex business rules and 
converting them into transformation rules which formed the main element of the mapping 
document. 
 
• Work with the mocking up of datasets during the testing phase and help with the preparation of 
test case documents.  
 
 
 
Associate - Retail Process — February,2013 - Oct,2015 
Amazon

Gained comprehensive knowledge of the workflow for custom Amazon tools. 
 
•
 
Discussed basic pricing agreements while onboarding as an Amazon vendor. 
•
 
Onboarded about 1500 new clients in the year of 2015-2016.

Developed Excel macros to automate repetitive tasks. 
 
•
 
Contributed to achieving impromptu operational objectives.

Collaborated with team to generate profit of 3 million in 2017.

Adhered to SOPs and suggested process enhancements.

Tata Consultancy Services
